name: River Pines Resort
description: River Pines Resort in Graeagle offers charming cabins and lodge rooms along the Middle Fork of the Feather River. Walking distance to Graeagle Meadows Golf Course with on-site dining and a relaxed mountain atmosphere.
shortDescription: Charming riverside cabins in Graeagle, walking distance to Graeagle Meadows Golf Course.
highlights: Charming cabins on the Feather River
Walking distance to Graeagle Meadows Golf Course

roomTypes.name: Lodge Room
roomTypes.description: Comfortable lodge room with mountain decor.

roomTypes.name: Cabin
roomTypes.description: Private cabin with kitchenette and deck.

roomTypes.name: Family Cabin
roomTypes.description: Larger cabin for groups with full kitchen.

dining.name: River Pines Restaurant
dining.description: On-site dining with American comfort food.

dining.name: River Pines Bar
dining.description: Casual bar with cocktails and beer.

faqs.question: What golf courses are near River Pines?
faqs.answer: Graeagle Meadows is walking distance. Plumas Pines, Whitehawk Ranch, and Nakoma are 10-20 minutes.

faqs.question: Does River Pines have dining?
faqs.answer: Yes — on-site restaurant and bar for post-round meals.

meta.title: River Pines Resort Graeagle | Cabins & Golf Packages
meta.description: Riverside cabins in Graeagle near Graeagle Meadows Golf Course. On-site dining and custom golf packages.
